name: Dogfight (itch) (foxtrot-roger)
description:
Info

Thanks for playing!

This game was developed for the Brackey Game Jam 2021.2.

Destroy all the enemies in the 12 available levels to win.

Credits foxtrot-rogerConcept, code, graphicsfokaiSound effects, music Notes

If the game doesn't work properly in the browser, download the standalone version at the end of this page.

How to play

You control the green plane, it will try to follow your mouse.

The plane will accelerate when going down and decelerate when going up.

Controls (AZERTY)
  • Z : Slow down plane
  • E : Speed up plane 
  • Left click : shoot (you can hold it)
  • Escape : Go back to the main menu
Controls (QWERTY/QWERTZ)
  • W : Slow down plane
  • E : Speed up plane 
  • Left click : shoot (you can hold it)
  • Escape : Go back to the main menu
